LanguageData.ASU_WhiteBread.label: Shokupan
LanguageData.ASU_WhiteBread.description: 【特産品】[Specialty Product] Plain white bread made with flour. The seasoning helps, but it just needs a little something more...
LanguageData.ASU_ButterWhiteBread.label: Batātōsuto
LanguageData.ASU_ButterWhiteBread.description: Buttered toast made from white bread.
LanguageData.ASU_JamWhiteBread.label: Jamutōsuto
LanguageData.ASU_JamWhiteBread.description: Toasted white bread that has been extravagantly covered in jam.
LanguageData.ASU_OguraWhiteBread.label: Oguratōsuto
LanguageData.ASU_OguraWhiteBread.description: A simple luxury made of toast topped with Ogura mochi and butter.
LanguageData.ASU_BaconWhiteBread.label: Bēkontōsuto
LanguageData.ASU_FriedEggWhiteBread.label: Medamayakitōsuto
LanguageData.ASU_FriedEggWhiteBread.description: Care has been take to perfectly place a fried egg on this piece of toast: enjoy it.
LanguageData.ASU_Sandwich.label: Sandoitchi
